duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare customer orders and ensure safety above all else in the warehouse environment.
Select and fulfill large scale orders in a warehouse or distribution center.
Operate motorized pallet jack or similar equipment for order picking and movement.
Work in a multi-temperature environment, lifting/carrying/pushing/pulling products repetitively.
Contribute to the success of the company through work ethic, collaborative spirit, and service.
Build trusting relationships with team members and strive for integrity and reliability.

education_certification.credential: Experience in high endurance or highly physical activity preferred.
